# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>
  
## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-110">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-110">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-111">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-111">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-112">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-112">9 digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-113">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-113">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-114">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-114">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-115">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작하는 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-115">Four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-116">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-116">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-117">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-117">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-118">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-118">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-119">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-119">A digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-120">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 9 개의 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-120">Unformatted: 9 consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-121">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-122">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-122">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-123">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-124">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-124">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-125">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-126">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-126">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-146">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-146">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-148">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-148">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-150">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-150">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-151">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-151">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-152">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-152">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-153">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-153">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-154">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-154">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-155">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-155">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-156">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-156">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-157">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-157">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-158">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-158">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-159">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-159">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-160">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-160">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-161">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-161">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-167">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-167">DNI</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-173">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-173">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-174">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-174">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-175">6-10자리 숫자(은행 지점 번호 포함 또는 제외)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-175">6-10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-176">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-176">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-177">계좌 번호는 6-10자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-177">Account number is 6-10 digits.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-178">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-178">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-179">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-179">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-180">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-180">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-181">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-181">Three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-182">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-182">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-183">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-183">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-184">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-184">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-185">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-185">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-186">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-186">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-187">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-187">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-188">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-188">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-189">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-189">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-190">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-190">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-191">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-191">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-192">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-192">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-193">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-194">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-194">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-195">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-195">correspondent bank</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-207">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-207">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-208">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-208">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-209">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-209">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-210">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-210">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-211">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-211">Nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-212">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-212">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-213">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-213">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-214">5자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-214">Five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-215">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-215">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-216">1-2개의 선택적 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-216">1-2 optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-217">4-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-217">4-9 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-218">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-218">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-219">9자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-219">Nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-220">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-220">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-221">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-221">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-222">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-222">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-223">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-223">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-224">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-224">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-225">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-225">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-226">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-226">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-326">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-326">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-328">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-328">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-330">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-330">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-331">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-331">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-332">9번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-332">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-333">10번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-333">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-334">11번째 숫자(선택 사항)는 개인 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-334">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-335">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-335">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-336">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-336">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-337">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-337">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-338">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-338">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-339">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-339">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-340">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-340">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-341">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-341">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-346">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-346">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-347">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-347">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-348">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-348">information branch</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-353">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-353">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-355">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-355">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-357">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-357">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-358">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-358">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-359">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-359">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-360">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-360">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-361">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-361">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-362">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-362">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-363">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-363">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-397">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-397">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-399">8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-399">8-9 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-401">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백과 함께 표시되는 8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-401">8-9 digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-402">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-402">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-403">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-403">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-404">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-404">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-405">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-405">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-406">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-406">2-3 digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-407">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-408">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-408">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-411">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-411">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-412">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-412">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-413">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-413">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-414">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-414">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-415">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-415">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-416">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-416">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-417">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-417">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-418">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-418">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-419">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-419">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-420">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-420">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-421">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-421">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-422">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-422">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-423">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-423">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-424">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-424">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-425">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-425">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-426">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-426">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-427">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-428">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-428">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-429">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-430">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-430">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-431">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-432">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-432">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-433">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-434">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-435">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-435">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-436">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-436">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-453">오스트리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-453">Austria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-454">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-454">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-455">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-456">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-456">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-457">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-458">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-458">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-459">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-459">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-460">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-460">Two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-461">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-462">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-462">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-463">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-464">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-464">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-465">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-465">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-466">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-466">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
<!-- EU austria_eu_national_id -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-472">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-472">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-473">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-473">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-474">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-474">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-475">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-475">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-476">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-477">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-477">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-478">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-478">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-479">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-479">One space (optional)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-480">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-480">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-481">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-482">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-483">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-485">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-485">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-486">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-486">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-487">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-487">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-488">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-488">**Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-494">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-494">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-495">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-495">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-496">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-497">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-497">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-498">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-499">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-499">10 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-500">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-500">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-501">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-501">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-502">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-502">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-503">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-504">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-504">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-506">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-506">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-507">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-507">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-508">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-508">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-509">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-509">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-510">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-510">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-511">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-511">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-525">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-525">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-527">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-527">Austria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-528">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 ID 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-528">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax ID number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-529">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-529">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-530">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-530">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-531">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-531">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-532">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-532">Nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-533">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-533">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-534">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-534">A hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-535">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-535">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-536">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-536">A forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-537">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-537">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-538">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-538">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-539">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-539">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-540">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-540">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-541">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-541">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-542">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-542">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-543">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-543">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-545">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-545">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-568">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-568">Azure DocumentDB Auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-569">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-569">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-570">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-570">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-571">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-571">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-572">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-572">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-573">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-573">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-574">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-574">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-575">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-575">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-576">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-576">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-577">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-577">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-578">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-578">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-579">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-579">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-580">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-580">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-581">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-581">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-582">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-582">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-583">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-583">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-584">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-584">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-585">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-585">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-586">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-586">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-587">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-587">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-588">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-588">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-589">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-589">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-590">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-590">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-591">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-591">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-592">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-592">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-593">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-593">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-594">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-594">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-595">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-595">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-596">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-596">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-597">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-597">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-598">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-598">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-599">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-599">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-600">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-600">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-601">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-601">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-602">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-602">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-603">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-604">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-604">The string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-605">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-605">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-606">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-606">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-607">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-607">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-608">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-608">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-609">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-609">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-610">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-610">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-611">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-611">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-612">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-612">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-613">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-613">Any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-614">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-614">The string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-615">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-615">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-616">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-616">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-617">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-617">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-618">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-618">One or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-619">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-619">A semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-623">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-624">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-624">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-625">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-625">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-640">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-640">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-641">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-642">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-642">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-643">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-643">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-644">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-644">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-645">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-645">The string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-646">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-646">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-647">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-647">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-648">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-648">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-649">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-649">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-650">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-650">The string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-651">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-651">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-652">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-652">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-653">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-653">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-654">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-654">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-655">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-655">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-656">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-656">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-657">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-657">Any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-658">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-658">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-659">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-660">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-661">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-662">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-662">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-663">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-663">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-664">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-664">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-680">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-680">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-681">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-681">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>


## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-706">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-706">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-707">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-708">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-708">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-709">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-709">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-710">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-710">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-711">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-711">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-712">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-712">net"</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-715">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-715">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-716">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-716">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-717">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-717">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-718">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-718">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-719">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-719">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-720">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-720">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-721">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-721">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-722">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-722">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-723">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-723">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-724">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-724">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-725">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-725">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-726">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-726">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-727">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-727">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-732">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-732">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-733">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-733">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-734">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-734">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-735">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-735">127.0.0.1</span></span>
