## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-740">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-740">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-741">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-742">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-742">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-743">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-743">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-744">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-744">The string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-745">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-745">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-746">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-746">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-747">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-747">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-748">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-748">Any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-749">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-749">The string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-750">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-750">Any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-751">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-751">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-752">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-752">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-753">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-753">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-754">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-754">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-755">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-755">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-756">Azure Service Bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-756">Azure Service Bus Connection String</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-757">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-758">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-758">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-759">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-759">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-760">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-760">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-761">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-761">The string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-762">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-762">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-763">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-763">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-764">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-764">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-765">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-765">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-766">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-766">The string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-767">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-767">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-768">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-768">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-769">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-769">The string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-770">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-770">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-771">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-771">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-772">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-772">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-773">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-773">Any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-774">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-774">An equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-775">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-776">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-776">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-777">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-778">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-778">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-779">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-779">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-780">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-780">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-781">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-781">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-782">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-782">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-783">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-783">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-784">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-784">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-785">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-785">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-786">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-786">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-787">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-787">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-788">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-788">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-789">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-789">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-790">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-790">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-791">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-791">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-792">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-792">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-793">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-793">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-794">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-794">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-795">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-795">Azure Storage Account Key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-796">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-796">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-797">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-797">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-798">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-798">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-799">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-799">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-800">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-800">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-801">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-801">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-802">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-802">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-803">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-803">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-804">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-804">The string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-805">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-805">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-806">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-806">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-807">0-2 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-807">0-2 whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-808">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-808">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-809">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-809">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-810">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-811">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-811">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-812">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-813">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-814">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-814">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-815">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-815">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-816">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-816">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-834">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-834">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-835">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-835">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-836">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-836">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-837">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-837">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-838">보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 0-1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-838">0-1 of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-839">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-839">Any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-840">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-840">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-841">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-842">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-842">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-843">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-844">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-844">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-845">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-845">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-846">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-846">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-847">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-847">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-848">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-848">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-849">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-849">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-850">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-850">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-851">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-851">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-852">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-852">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-853">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-853">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-854">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-854">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-855">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-855">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-856">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-856">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-857">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-857">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-859">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-859">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-878">fuehrerschein-veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-878">fuehrerschein- nr</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-879">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-879">Belgium national number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-880">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-880">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-882">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-882">11 digits plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-884">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-884">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-885">생년월일을 나타내는 YY.MM.DD 형식의 6자리 숫자와 마침표 2개 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-885">Six digits and two periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-886">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-886">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-887">세 개의 순차적 숫자(남성의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-887">Three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-888">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-888">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-889">검사 숫자에 해당하는 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-889">Two digits that are a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-890">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-891">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-892">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-893">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-893">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-894">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-894">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-895">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-895">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-896">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-896">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
  <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-897">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-897">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_national_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-898">Keyword_belgium_national_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-898">Keyword_belgium_national_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-903">identifiant 국가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-903">identifiant national</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-904">identifiantnational #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-904">identifiantnational#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-905">identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-905">identificatie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-906">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-906">identification</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-955">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-955">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-956">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-956">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-957">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-957">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-958">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-958">Two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-959">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-959">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-960">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-960">Two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-961">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-962">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-962">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-963">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-964">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-965">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-965">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-966">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-966">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-967">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-967">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-968">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-968">**Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-969">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-969">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-970">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-970">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-971">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-971">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-972">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-972">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-973">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-973">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-974">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-974">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-975">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-975">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-976">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-976">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-977">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-977">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-978">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-978">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-979">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-979">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-980">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-980">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-981">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-981">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-982">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-982">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-983">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-983">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-984">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-984">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-985">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-985">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-986">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-986">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-987">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-987">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-988">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-988">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-989">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-989">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1009">벨기에 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1009">Belgium tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1010">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1010">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1011">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1012">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1012">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1013">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1014">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1014">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1015">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1015">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1016">"0" 또는 "1"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1016">A "0" or "1"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1017">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1017">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1018">"0" 또는 "1" 또는 "2" 또는 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1018">A "0" or "1" or "2" or "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1019">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1019">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1021">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1021">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1024">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1024">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1025">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1025">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1084">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1084">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1085">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1086">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1086">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1087">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1088">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1088">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1089">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1089">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1090">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1090">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1091">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1091">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1092">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1092">A period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1093">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1093">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1094">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1094">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1095">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1095">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1096">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1096">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1097">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1097">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1098">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1098">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1099">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1099">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1100">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1100">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1101">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1101">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1102">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1102">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1103">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1103">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1104">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1104">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1105">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1105">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1106">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1106">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1107">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1107">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1108">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1108">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1110">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1110">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1111">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1111">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1112">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1112">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1113">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1113">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1114">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1114">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1115">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1115">Imposto</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1119">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1119">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1120">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1121">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1121">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1122">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1122">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1123">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1123">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1124">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1124">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1125">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1125">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1126">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1126">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1127">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1127">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1128">3자리 숫자(처음 8자리 숫자는 등록 번호임) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1128">Three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1129">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1129">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1130">4자리 지점 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1130">Four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1131">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1131">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1132">검사 숫자에 해당하는 2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1132">Two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1133">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1134">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1135">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1136">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1136">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1137">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1137">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1138">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1138">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1139">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1139">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1140">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1141">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1141">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1142">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1142">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1164">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1164">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1165">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1165">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1166">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1166">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1167">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1167">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1169">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1169">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1170">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1170">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1171">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1171">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1172">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1172">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1173">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1173">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1174">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1174">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1175">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1175">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1176">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1176">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1177">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1177">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1178">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1178">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1179">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1179">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1180">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1180">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1181">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1182">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1182">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1183">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1184">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1185">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1185">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1186">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1186">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1187">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1187">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1188">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1189">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1189">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1190">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1190">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1191">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1191">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1192">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1192">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1193">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1193">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1194">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1194">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1195">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1195">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1196">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1196">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1197">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1197">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1198">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1198">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1199">RG(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1199">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1200">RIC(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1200">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1201">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1201">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1202">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1202">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1203">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1204">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1204">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1205">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1206">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1206">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1207">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1208">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1208">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1209">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1210">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1210">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1211">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1211">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1212">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1212">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1214">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1214">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1218">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1218">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1223">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1223">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1224">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1224">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1225">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1225">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1227">свидетелство за управление на мпс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1227">свидетелство за управление на мпс</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1228">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1228">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1229">сумпс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1229">сумпс</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1230">шофьорска книжка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1230">шофьорска книжка</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1231">불가리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1231">Bulgaria national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1232">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1232">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1234">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1234">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1236">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1236">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1237">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1237">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1238">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1238">Two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1239">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1239">One digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1240">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1240">One check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1241">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1241">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1242">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1242">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1243">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1243">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1244">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1244">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1245">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1245">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1246">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1246">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_national_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1247">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1247">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1248">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1248">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1293">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1293">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1294">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1294">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1295">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1295">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1296">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1296">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1297">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1297">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1298">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1298">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1299">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1299">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1300">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1300">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1301">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1301">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1302">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1303">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1303">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1304">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1304">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1305">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1305">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1306">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1306">**Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1307">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1307">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1308">불가리아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1308">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1309">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1309">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1310">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1310">номер на паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1311">불가리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1311">Bulgaria tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1312">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1312">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1313">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1314">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1314">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1315">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1316">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1316">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1317">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1318">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1318">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1321">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1321">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1322">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1322">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1324">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1324">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->

 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1369">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1369">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1370">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1370">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1371">7 또는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1371">Seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1372">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1372">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1373">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1373">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1374">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1374">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1375">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1375">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1376">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1376">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1377">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1377">Three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1378">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1378">A zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1379">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1379">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1380">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1381">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1381">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1382">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1383">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1383">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1384">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1384">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1385">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1385">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1386">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1386">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1387">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1387">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1388">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1388">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1389">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1389">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1413">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1413">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1414">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1414">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1415">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1415">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1416">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1416">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1417">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1417">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1418">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1418">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1419">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1419">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1420">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1420">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1421">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1421">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1422">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1422">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1423">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1423">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1424">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1424">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1560">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1560">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1561">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1562">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1562">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1563">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1564">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1564">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1565">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1565">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1566">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1566">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1567">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1567">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1569">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1569">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1570">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1570">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1582">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1582">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1583">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1583">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1584">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1584">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1585">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1585">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1586">2개의 대문자와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1586">Two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1587">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1588">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1588">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1589">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1590">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1590">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1591">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1591">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1592">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1592">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
