## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1622">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1622">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1623">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1623">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1624">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1624">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1625">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1625">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1626">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1626">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1627">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1628">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1628">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1629">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1630">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_canada_phin 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1631">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1631">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found..</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1664">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1664">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1665">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1665">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1666">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백을 포함하는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1666">Nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1667">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1667">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1668">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1668">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1669">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1669">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1670">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1670">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1671">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1671">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1672">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1672">A hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1673">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1673">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1674">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1674">Unformatted: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1675">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1675">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1676">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1676">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1677">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1677">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1678">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1678">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1679">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1679">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1680">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1680">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1681">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1681">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1682">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1682">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1683">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1683">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1684">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1684">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1685">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1685">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1686">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1686">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1687">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1687">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1688">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1713">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1713">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1714">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1715">7-8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호 확인 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1715">7-8 digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1716">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1716">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1717">7-8자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1717">7-8 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1718">1-2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1718">1-2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1719">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1719">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1720">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1720">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1721">마침표 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1721">A period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1722">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1722">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1723">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1723">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1724">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1724">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1725">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1726">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1726">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1727">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1728">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1728">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1729">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1729">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1730">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1730">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1731">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1731">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1732">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1732">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1733">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1733">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1734">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1734">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1735">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1736">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1736">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1737">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1737">National Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1738">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1738">Identity card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1739">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1739">ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1740">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1740">Identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1741">Rol Único Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1741">Rol Único Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1742">실행</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1742">RUN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1743">Rol Único Tributario</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1743">Rol Único Tributario</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1744">RUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1744">RUT</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1745">Cédula de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1745">Cédula de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1746">Número De Identificación Nacional</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1746">Número De Identificación Nacional</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1747">Tarjeta de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1747">Tarjeta de identificación</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1748">Identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1748">Identificación</span></span> 
   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1749">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1749">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1750">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1750">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1751">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1751">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1752">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1753">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1753">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1754">주소 코드에 해당하는 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1754">Six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1755">생년월일에 해당하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1755">Eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1756">주문 코드에 해당하는 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1756">Three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1757">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1757">One digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1759">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1762">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1762">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1763">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1763">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1764">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1764">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1766">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1766">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1767">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1767">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1780">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1780">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1781">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1782">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1782">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1783">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1784">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1784">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1785">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1785">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1786">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1786">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-1787">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1787">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1788">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1788">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1789">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1789">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1790">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1790">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1791">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1791">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1792">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1792">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1793">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1793">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1794">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1794">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-1795">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1795">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1796">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1796">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-1797">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-1797">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2057">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2057">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2058">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2058">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2060">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2060">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2062">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2062">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2063">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2063">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2064">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2064">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2065">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2065">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2066">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2066">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2067">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2067">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2068">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2068">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2069">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2069">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2070">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2070">**Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2071">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2071">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2072">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2072">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2073">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2073">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2074">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2074">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2075">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2075">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2076">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2076">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2077">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2077">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2078">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2078">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2079">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2079">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2080">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2080">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2081">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2081">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2082">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2082">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2083">vozačka dozvola</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2083">vozačka dozvola</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2084">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2084">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2085">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2085">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2086">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2087">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2087">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2088">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2088">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2089">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2089">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2090">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2090">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2091">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2091">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2092">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2092">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2093">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2094">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2094">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2095">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2095">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2096">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2096">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2126">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2126">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2127">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2128">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2129">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2129">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2130">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2131">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2131">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2132">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2133">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2133">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2134">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2135">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2136">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2136">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2137">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2137">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2138">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2138">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2139">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2139">**Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2140">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2140">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2141">크로아티아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2141">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2142">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2142">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2143">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2143">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2144">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2144">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2145">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2145">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2146">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2146">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2147">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2147">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2148">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2148">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2149">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2149">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2150">최종 자릿수는 국제 데이터 교환 목적을 위한 검사 숫자 이며, HR는 11 자리 숫자 앞에 추가 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2150">Final digit is a check digit For the purposes of international data exchange, the letters HR are added preceding the eleven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2155">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2155">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2156">Keyword_croatia_oib_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2156">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_oib_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2157">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2158">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2158">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2159">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2159">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2160">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
<Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2161">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2161">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2162">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2162">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2163">Personal Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2163">Personal Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2164">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2164">Osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2165">OIB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2165">OIB</span></span> 

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2166">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2166">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2167">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2168">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2169">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2169">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2170">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2171">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2171">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2172">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2172">Ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2173">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2173">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2174">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2175">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2175">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2176">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2177">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2177">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2178">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2178">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2179">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2179">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2180">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2180">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2181">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2181">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2183">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2183">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2190">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2190">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2191">nationalnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2191">nationalnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2195">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2195">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2196">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2196">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2197">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2197">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2198">크로아티아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2198">Croatia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2199">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2199">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identificaiton Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2200">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2201">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2201">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2202">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2203">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2203">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2204">임의로 선택한 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2204">Ten digits, randomly chosen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2205">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2205">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2206">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2207">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2207">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2208">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2209">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2210">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2210">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2211">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2211">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2212">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2212">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2213">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2213">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2214">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2214">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2215">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2215">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2216">majstorski broj građana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2216">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2217">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2217">master citizen number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2244">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2244">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2245">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2245">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2246">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2247">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2247">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2248">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2249">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2249">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2250">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2251">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2251">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2254">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2254">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2255">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2255">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2256">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2256">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2257">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2257">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2258">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2258">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2259">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2259">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2260">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2260">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2261">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2261">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2262">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2262">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2263">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2263">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2264">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2264">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2265">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2265">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2266">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2266">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2267">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2267">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2268">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2268">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2269">άδεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2269">άδεια οδήγησης</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2270">키프로스 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2270">Cyprus national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2271">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2271">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2272">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2272">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2273">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2273">Ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2274">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2274">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2275">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2275">Ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2276">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2277">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2277">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2278">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2279">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2280">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2280">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2281">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2281">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2282">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2282">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2283">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2283">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2284">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2284">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2285">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2285">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2286">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2286">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2287">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2287">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2288">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2288">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2289">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2289">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2290">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2290">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2291">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2291">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2292">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2293">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2293">One letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2294">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2295">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2295">One letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2297">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2297">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2300">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2300">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2301">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2301">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2302">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2302">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2303">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2303">**Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2304">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2304">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2305">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2305">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2306">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2306">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2307">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2307">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2308">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2308">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2309">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2309">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2310">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2310">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2311">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2311">Eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2312">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2312">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2313">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2313">Eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2314">"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2314">A "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2315">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2315">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2316">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2316">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2317">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2318">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2318">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2319">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2320">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2321">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2321">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2322">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2322">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2324">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2324">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2353">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2353">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2356">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2356">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2358">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2358">Eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2359">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2359">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2360">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2360">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2361">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2361">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2363">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2366">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2367">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2369">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2369">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2370">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2370">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2372">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2372">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2373">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2373">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2374">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2374">drivers lic.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2376">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2376">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2377">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2377">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2378">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2378">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2379">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2379">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2380">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2380">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2381">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2381">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2382">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2382">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2383">řidičský prúkaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2383">řidičský prúkaz</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2384">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2384">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2385">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2385">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2386">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2387">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2387">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2388">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2389">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2389">Eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2390">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2391">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2391">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2392">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2393">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2394">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2394">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2395">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2395">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2396">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2396">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2397">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2397">**Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2398">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2398">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2399">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2399">czech passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2400">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2400">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2401">cestovní pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2401">cestovní pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2402">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2402">pas</span></span>

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2403">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2403">Czech personal identity number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2404">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 번들에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2404">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National identification number bundle and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2405">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2406">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2406">Nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2407">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2408">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2408">Nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2409">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2409">Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2410">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2410">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2411">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2411">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2412">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2412">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2413">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2413">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2414">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2414">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2415">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2415">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2416">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2416">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2417">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2417">Six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2418">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2418">A forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2419">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2419">Four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2420">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2421">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2421">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2422">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2423">DLP 정책은 300 Func_czech_id_card 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2424">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2424">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2425">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2425">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
<Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497"      patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
      <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2426">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2426">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2427">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2427">czech personal identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2428">Rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2428">Rodné číslo</span></span>



## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2429">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2429">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2430">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2430">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2431">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2432">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2432">Ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2433">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2434">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2434">Ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2435">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2435">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2436">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2436">A backslash</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2437">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2437">Three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2438">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2438">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2439">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2439">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2440">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2440">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2441">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2441">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2442">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2442">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2443">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2443">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2444">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2444">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2445">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2445">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2446">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2446">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2447">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2447">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2451">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2451">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2452">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2452">social security number</span></span>
