- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2455">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2455">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2456">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2456">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2457">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2457">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2458">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2458">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2459">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2459">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2460">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2460">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2461">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2461">rodne cislo</span></span>

## <a name="czech-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2462">체코어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2462">Czech tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2463">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2463">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2464">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2465">선택적 백슬래시가 있는 9 자리 또는 10 진수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2465">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2466">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2467">선택적 backslashl이 있는 아홉 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2467">Nine or ten digits with an optional backslashl:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2468">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2468">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2469">백슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2469">A backslash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2470">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2470">Three or four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2471">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2472">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2472">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2475">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2475">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2476">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2476">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2477">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2477">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2496">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2496">rodné číslo</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2497">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2502">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2502">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2503">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2503">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2504">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2504">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2513">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2513">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2514">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2514">tax number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2515">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2515">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2516">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2516">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2517">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2517">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2518">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2518">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2519">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2519">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2520">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2520">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2521">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2522">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2522">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2523">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2524">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2524">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2525">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2525">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2526">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2526">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2527">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2527">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2528">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2528">**Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2529">| dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2529">|dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2530">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2530">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2531">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2531">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2532">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2532">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2533">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2533">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2534">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2534">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2536">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2536">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2537">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2537">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2538">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2538">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2539">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2539">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2540">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2540">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2541">kørekort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2541">kørekort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2542">kørekortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2542">kørekortnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2543">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2543">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2544">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2544">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2545">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2546">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2546">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2547">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2547">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2548">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2548">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2550">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2550">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2552">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2553">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2553">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2554">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2554">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2556">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2556">**Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2557">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2557">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2558">덴마크어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2558">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2559">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2559">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2560">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2560">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2561">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2561">pasnummer</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2562">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2562">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2563">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2563">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2564">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2565">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2565">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2566">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2567">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2567">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2568">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2568">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2569">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2569">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2570">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2570">Four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2571">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2572">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2572">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2573">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2574">DLP 정책은 300 Regex_denmark_id 문자 근사에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾는 경우이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 한다는 것을 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The regular expression Regex_denmark_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2575">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2575">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2576">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
<Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2588">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2628">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2628">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2629">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2629">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2630">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2630">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2631">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2631">Ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2632">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2632">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2633">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2633">Ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2634">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2634">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2635">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2635">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2636">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2636">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2637">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2637">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2638">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2638">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2639">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2639">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2640">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2640">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2641">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2641">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2642">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2642">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2644">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2644">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2658">덴마크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2658">Denmark tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2659">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2660">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2661">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2661">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2662">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2663">Hyphenl를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2663">Ten digits containing a hyphenl:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2664">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2664">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2665">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2665">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2666">첫 번째 숫자가 출생 세기에 해당 하 고 마지막 숫자가 개별 성별에 해당 하는 시퀀스 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (남성의 경우 홀수 및 암에도 해당)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2666">Four digits that correspond to a sequence number where the first digit corresponds to the century of birth and the last digit corresponds to the individual's gender (odd for male and even for female)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2668">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2668">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2671">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2671">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2672">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2672">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2673">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2674">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2674">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2726">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2726">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2728">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2728">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2730">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2730">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2731">등록 코드에 해당하는 abcdefghjklmnprstux 중 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2731">One letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2732">등록자 성의 첫 문자에 해당하는 한 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2732">One letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2733">검사 숫자의 마지막 7개 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2733">Seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2734">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2735">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2735">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2736">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2737">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2738">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2738">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2739">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2739">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2740">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2740">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2741">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2741">None</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2742">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2742">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2743">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2743">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2744">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2745">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2745">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2746">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2747">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2747">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2748">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2748">The letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2749">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2749">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2751">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2751">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2754">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2755">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2755">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2756">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2756">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2757">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2757">**Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2759">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2759">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2760">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2760">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2761">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2761">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2762">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2762">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2763">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2763">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2764">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2764">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2765">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2765">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2766">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2766">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2767">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2767">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2768">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2768">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2769">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2769">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2770">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2770">permis de conduire</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2771">에스토니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2771">Estonia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2772">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2772">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2773">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2774">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2774">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2775">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2776">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2776">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2777">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2777">One digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2778">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2778">Six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2779">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2779">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2780">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2780">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2781">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2781">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2782">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2782">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2783">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2783">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2784">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2784">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2785">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2785">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2786">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2786">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2787">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2787">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2788">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2788">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2819">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2819">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2821">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2821">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2822">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2822">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2823">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2823">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2824">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2824">One letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2825">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2825">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2826">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2826">One letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2827">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2827">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2828">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2828">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2829">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2829">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2830">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2830">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2831">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2831">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2832">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2832">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2833">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2833">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2834">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2834">**Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2835">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2835">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2836">에스토니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2836">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2837">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2837">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2838">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2838">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2839">에스토니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2839">Estonia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2840">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2840">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2841">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2842">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2842">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2843">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2844">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2844">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2845">성별에 해당 하는 숫자와 홀수로 해당 하 고, 홀수를 지정 하 여 19th 세기에 대해 1, 2를 나타내는 숫자입니다. 3, 20th 세기에 대해 4를 적용 합니다. 21 세기에 대해 5, 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2845">One digit that corresponds to gender and century of birth where an odd number indicates male and the even number indicates female as follows: 1, 2 for the 19th century; 3, 4 for the 20th century; and 5, 6 for the 21st century</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2846">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2846">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2847">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2847">Three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2848">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2848">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2849">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2849">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2850">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2850">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2851">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2851">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2852">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2852">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2853">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2853">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2854">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2854">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2855">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2855">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2856">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2856">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2889">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2889">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2890">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2890">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2891">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2891">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2892">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2892">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2893">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2893">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2894">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2895">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2895">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2896">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-2897">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2897">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2898">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2898">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2899">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2899">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2900">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2900">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2901">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2901">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2902">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2902">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2903">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2903">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2904">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2904">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2905">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2906">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_eu_debit_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-2907">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2907">Keyword_eu_debit_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-2908">account number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-2908">account number</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3351">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3351">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3352">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3352">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3353">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3354">하이픈을 포함하는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3354">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3355">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3356">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3356">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3357">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3357">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3358">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3358">A hyphen</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3359">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3359">Four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3360">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3360">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3361">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3361">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3362">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3362">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3363">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3363">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3364">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3364">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3365">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3365">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3366">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3366">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3367">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3367">**Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3368">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3368">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3369">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3369">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3370">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3370">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3371">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3371">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3372">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3372">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3373">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3373">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3374">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3374">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3375">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3375">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3376">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3376">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3377">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3377">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3378">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3378">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3379">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3379">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3380">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3380">ajokortti</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3381">핀란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3381">Finland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3382">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3382">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3383">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3383">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3384">세기를 나타내는 6자리 숫자와 문자, 3자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3384">Six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3385">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3385">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3386">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3386">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3387">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3387">Six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3388">세기 표시('-', '+' 또는 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3388">Century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3389">3자리 개인 ID 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3389">Three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3390">검사 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3390">A digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3391">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3392">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3392">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3393">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3394">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3394">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3395">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3395">The function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3396">Keyword_finnish_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3396">A keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3397">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3397">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finnish National ID-->
<Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3446">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3446">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3447">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3447">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3448">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3448">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3449">9개의 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3449">Combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3450">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3450">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3451">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합: 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3451">Combination of nine letters and digits: Two letters (not case sensitive) Seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3452">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3452">Checksum</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3453">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3453">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3454">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3454">Definition</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3455">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3456">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3456">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3457">Keyword_finland_passport_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3457">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3458">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3458">Keywords</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3459">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3459">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3460">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3460">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3461">에이 si</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3461">Passi</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3462">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3462">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3463">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3463">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3464">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3464">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3465">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3465">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3466">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3466">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3467">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3467">An 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3468">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3468">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3469">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3469">One instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3470">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3470">Plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3471">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3471">Minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3472">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3472">The letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3473">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3473">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3474">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3474">One letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3475">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3476">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3476">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3477">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3478">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3478">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3479">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3479">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3480">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3480">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3481">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3482">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3482">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3506">핀란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3506">Finland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3507">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3507">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3508">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3509">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3509">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3510">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3511">숫자, 문자, 더하기 및 빼기 기호를 11 문자로 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3511">An 11-character combination of digits, letters, and plus and minus sign:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3512">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3512">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3513">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 + 기호가 1800-1899 사이에 태어난 것을 의미 하는 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 빼기 기호는 1900-1999 사이에 출생를 의미 하며 "A"는 "A"를 2000 의미 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3513">One of the following: a plus sign, a minus sign, or the letter "A" (not case sensitive) where the plus sign means born between 1800-1899, the minus sign means born between 1900-1999, and "A" means born 2000 and after</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3514">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3514">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3515">1 개의 문자 또는 한 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3515">One letter or one number</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3516">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3516">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3517">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3517">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3518">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3518">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3519">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3519">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3520">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3520">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3521">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3521">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3523">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3523">The function  `Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3574">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3574">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3575">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3575">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3576">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3577">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3577">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3578">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3579">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3579">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3580">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3581">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3582">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3583">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3583">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3584">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3584">The function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3585">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3585">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3586">Keyword_french_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3586">A keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3587">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3587">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3588">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3588">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3589">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3589">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3591">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3591">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3592">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3592">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3593">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3593">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3594">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3594">permis de conduire</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3597">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3597">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3598">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3598">license numbers</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-identification-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3599">프랑스 국가 식별 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3599">France national identification card (CNI)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3600">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3600">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3601">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3602">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3602">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3603">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3604">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3604">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3605">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3605">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3606">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3606">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3607">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3607">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3608">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3608">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3609">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3609">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France CNI -->
<Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3611">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3613">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3613">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3614">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3614">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3615">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3615">cni</span></span>
