## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3622">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3622">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3623">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3623">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3624">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3624">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3625">9자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3625">Nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3626">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3626">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3627">9자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3627">Nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3628">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3628">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3629">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3629">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3630">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3630">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3631">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3631">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3632">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3632">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3633">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3633">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3634">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3634">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3635">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3635">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3636">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3636">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3648">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3648">パスポートのNum</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3656">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3656">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3657">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3657">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3658">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3658">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3659">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3659">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3660">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3660">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3661">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3661">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3662">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3662">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3663">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3663">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3664">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3664">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3665">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3665">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3666">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3666">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3667">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3667">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3668">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3668">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3669">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3669">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3670">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3670">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3671">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3671">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3672">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3672">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3673">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3673">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3674">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3674">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3675">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3675">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3676">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3678">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3678">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3690">아니요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3690">no.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3691">d'identite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3691">d'identite</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3692">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3692">social security number</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3702">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3702">France tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3703">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3703">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3705">개별 사용자의 경우 13 자리 숫자 및 엔터티의 경우 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3705">13 digits for individuals and nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3706">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3707">개별 사용자에 대 한 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3707">13 digits for individuals:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3708">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3708">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3709">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3709">12 digits</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3710">엔터티의 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3710">Nine digits for entities</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3711">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3712">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3712">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3713">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3714">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3715">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3715">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3716">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3716">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3717">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3718">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3718">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3738">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3738">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3739">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3739">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3740">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3741">11자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3741">Combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3742">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3743">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3743">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3744">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3744">A digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3745">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3745">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3746">6자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3746">Six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3747">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3747">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3748">1자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3748">A digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3749">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3750">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3751">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3752">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3752">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3753">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3753">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3754">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3754">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3755">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3755">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3756">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3756">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3757">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3757">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3758">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3758">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3851">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3851">Germany identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3852">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3852">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3853">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3853">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3854">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3854">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3855">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3855">Since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3856">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3856">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3857">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3857">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3858">2010년 11월 1일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3858">Since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3859">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3859">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3860">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3860">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3861">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3861">From 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3862">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3862">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3863">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3863">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3864">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3864">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3865">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3865">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3867">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3867">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3868">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3868">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3869">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3869">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3873">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3873">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3874">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3874">identifikation</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3884">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3884">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3885">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3885">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3886">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3887">10자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3887">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3888">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3889">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3889">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3890">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는 (C, F, G, H, J, K) 집합의 문자임</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3890">First character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3891">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3891">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3892">5자리 숫자 또는 (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z) 집합의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3892">Five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3893">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3893">A digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3894">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3894">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3895">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3895">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3896">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3896">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3897">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3897">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3898">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3898">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3899">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3899">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3900">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3900">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3901">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3901">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3902">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3902">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3903">5개의 키워드 목록 중에 포함된 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3903">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3904">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3904">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3905">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3906">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3906">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3907">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3907">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3908">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3908">reisepasse</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3922">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3922">Germany tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3923">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3923">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3924">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3925">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3925">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3926">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3927">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3927">11 digits :</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3928">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3928">Ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3929">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3929">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3930">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3931">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3931">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3932">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3933">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3934">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3934">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3935">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3935">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3936">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3936">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3937">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3937">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3963">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3963">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3964">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3964">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3965">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3965">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3966">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3966">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3967">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3967">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3968">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3968">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3969">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3970">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3970">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3972">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3972">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3973">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3973">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3974">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3974">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3975">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3975">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3976">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3976">**Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3980">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3980">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3985">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3985">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3986">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3986">driver's licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3990">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3990">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3991">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3991">Greece National ID Card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3992">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3992">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3993">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3993">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3994">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3994">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-3995">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3995">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-3996">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3996">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3997">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3997">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3998">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3998">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-3999">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-3999">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4000">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4000">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4001">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4001">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4002">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4002">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4003">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4003">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4008">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4008">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4009">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4009">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Greece National ID Card -->
<Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4013">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4013">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4014">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4014">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4015">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4015">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4016">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4016">identity card</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4020">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4020">Greece passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4021">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4021">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4022">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4023">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4023">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4025">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4025">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4026">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4027">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4027">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4028">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4030">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4030">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4031">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4031">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4032">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4032">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4033">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4033">**Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4034">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4034">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4035">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4035">greek passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4036">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4036">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4037">διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4037">διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4038">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4038">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4039">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4039">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4040">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4040">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4041">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4041">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4042">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4042">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4043">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4043">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4044">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4044">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4045">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4045">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4046">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4046">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4047">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4047">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4048">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4048">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4049">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4049">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4050">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4050">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4051">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4051">Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4055">aφμ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4055">aφμ</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4056">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4058">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4058">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4059">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4059">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4061">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4061">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4062">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4062">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4063">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4063">tax registry no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4064">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4064">tax registry number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4065">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4065">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4066">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4066">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4067">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4067">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4068">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4068">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4069">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4069">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4070">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4070">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4071">taxregistryno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4071">taxregistryno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4072">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4072">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4073">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4073">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4074">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4074">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4075">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4075">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4076">τον αριθμό φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4076">τον αριθμό φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4077">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4077">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span></span>


## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4078">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4078">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4079">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4079">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4080">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4080">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4081">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4081">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4082">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4082">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4083">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4083">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4084">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4084">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4085">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4085">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4086">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4086">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4087">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4087">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4088">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4088">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4089">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4089">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4090">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4090">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4091">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4091">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4092">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4093">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4093">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4094">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4094">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4095">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4095">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4096">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4096">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hong_kong_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4097">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4097">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4098">hkid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4098">hkid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4099">홍콩 특별 식별자 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4099">hong kong identity card</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4135">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4135">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4136">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4136">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4137">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4138">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4138">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4139">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4140">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4140">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4141">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4141">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4142">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4142">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4143">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4144">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4144">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4145">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4146">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4146">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4147">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4147">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4148">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4148">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4149">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4149">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4150">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4150">**Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4151">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4151">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4152">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4152">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4153">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4153">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4154">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4154">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4155">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4155">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4156">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4156">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4157">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4157">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4158">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4158">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4159">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4159">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4160">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4160">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4161">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4161">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4162">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4162">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4163">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4163">vezetoi engedely</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4164">헝가리어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4164">Hungary national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4165">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4165">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4167">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4167">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4169">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4169">11 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4170">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4170">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4171">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4171">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4172">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4172">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4173">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4173">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4174">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4175">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4175">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4176">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4177">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4177">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4178">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4178">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4179">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4179">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4180">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4180">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4181">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4181">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
</Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4182">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4182">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4191">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4191">személyi igazolvány</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4192">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4192">Hungary passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4193">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4193">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4194">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4195">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4195">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4196">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4197">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4197">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4198">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4198">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4199">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4199">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4200">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4200">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4201">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4202">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4202">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4203">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4203">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4204">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4204">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4205">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4205">**Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4206">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4206">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4207">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4207">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4208">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4208">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4209">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4209">útlevél száma</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4210">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4210">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4211">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4211">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4212">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4213">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4213">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4214">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4215">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4215">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4216">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4216">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4217">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4217">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4218">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4218">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4219">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4219">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4220">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4220">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4221">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4221">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4222">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4222">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4223">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4223">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4243">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4243">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4244">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4244">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4245">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4246">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4246">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4247">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4248">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4248">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4249">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4249">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4250">날짜 01/01/1867과 개별 생년월일 사이의 일 수에 해당 하는 5 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4250">Five digits that correspond to the number of days between the date 01/01/1867 and the date of the birth of the individual</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4251">같은 날에 태어난 사람을 구별 하기 위해 기회가 만든 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4251">Three digits that correspond to the number generated by chance to differentiate individuals born on the same day</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4252">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4252">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4253">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4254">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4254">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4255">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4256">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4257">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4257">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4258">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4258">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4259">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4259">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4260">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4260">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4272">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4272">tax no#</span></span>
