## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4286">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4286">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4287">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4287">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4288">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4288">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4289">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4289">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4290">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4290">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4291">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4291">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4292">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4292">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4293">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4293">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4294">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4295">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4297">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4298">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4298">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4299">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4299">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4300">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4301">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4301">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4302">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4302">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4303">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4303">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4304">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4304">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4305">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4305">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4306">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4307">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4307">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4308">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4309">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4309">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4310">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4310">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4311">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4311">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4312">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4312">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4313">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4313">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4314">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4314">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4315">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4315">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4316">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4316">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4317">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4317">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4318">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 85% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4318">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4319">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4319">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4320">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4320">The checksum passes.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4321">DLP 정책은 300 Func_india_aadhaar 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4321">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4322">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4322">The checksum passes.</span></span>
```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4323">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4323">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4324">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4324">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4325">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4325">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4326">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4326">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4327">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4327">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4328">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4328">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4329">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4329">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4330">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4330">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4331">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4331">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4332">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4332">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4333">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4333">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4334">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4334">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4335">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4335">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4336">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4336">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4337">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4337">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4338">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4338">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4339">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4339">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4340">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4340">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4341">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4341">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4343">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4343">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4345">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4346">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4346">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4347">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4347">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4348">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4348">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4349">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4349">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4350">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4350">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4351">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4351">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4352">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4352">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4353">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4353">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4354">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4355">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4355">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4356">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4357">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4357">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4358">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4358">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4359">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4359">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4360">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4360">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4361">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4361">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4362">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4362">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4363">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4363">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4364">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4364">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4365">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4365">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4366">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4366">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4367">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4367">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4368">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4368">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4369">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4369">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4370">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4370">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4371">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4371">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4372">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4372">None</span></span>

   

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4373">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4373">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4374">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4375">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4375">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4377">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4377">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4378">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4379">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4379">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4380">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4381">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4382">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4382">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4383">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4383">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4385">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4385">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4386">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4386">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4389">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4389">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4390">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4390">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4391">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4391">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4392">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4393">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4393">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4394">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4395">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4395">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4396">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4397">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4397">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4398">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4399">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4400">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4400">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4401">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4401">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4402">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4402">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4403">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4403">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4404">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4404">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4405">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4405">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4406">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4406">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4407">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4407">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4408">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4408">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4409">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4409">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4410">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4410">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4411">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4411">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4412">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4412">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4413">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4413">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4414">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4414">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4415">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4416">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4416">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4417">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4417">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4418">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4418">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4419">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4419">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4420">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4420">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4421">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4421">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4422">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4422">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4423">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4423">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4424">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4424">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4425">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4425">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4426">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4426">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4427">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4427">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4428">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4428">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4429">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4429">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4430">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4430">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4431">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4431">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4432">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4432">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4433">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4433">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4434">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4434">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4435">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4435">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4436">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4436">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4437">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4438">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4438">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4439">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4440">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4440">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4441">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4441">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4442">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4442">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4444">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4444">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4447">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4447">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4448">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4448">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4449">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4449">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4450">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4450">**Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4451">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4451">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4452">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4452">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4453">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4453">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4454">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4454">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4455">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4455">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4456">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4456">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4457">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4457">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4458">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4458">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4459">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4459">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4460">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4460">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4461">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4461">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4462">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4462">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4463">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4463">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4464">아일랜드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4464">Ireland national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4465">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 형식에만 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4465">This sensitive information type entity is only included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4466">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4466">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4467">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4467">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4468">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4468">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4469">지정 된 패턴에서 문자, 숫자 및 공백의 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4469">A nine-character combination of letters, digits, and a space in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4470">01 년 1 월 2013 일 현재 위치:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4470">From 01 January 2013 to now:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4471">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4471">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4472">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4472">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4473">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 "W" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4473">One space or the uppercase letter "W" (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4474">01 년 1 월 2013 일 이전:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4474">Prior to 01 January 2013:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4475">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4475">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4476">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4476">One check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4477">1 개의 공백 또는 대문자 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4477">One space or an uppercase letter (Case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4478">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4479">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4482">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4482">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4483">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4483">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4484">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4484">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4485">이 함수는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4485">The function finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!--Ireland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4486">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4486">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4514">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4514">Ireland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4515">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4515">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4516">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4517">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4517">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4518">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4519">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4519">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4520">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4520">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4521">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4521">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4522">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4523">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4524">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4525">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4525">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4526">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4526">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4527">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4527">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4528">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4528">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4529">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4529">**Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4530">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4530">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4531">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4531">irish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4532">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4532">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4533">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4533">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4534">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4534">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4535">포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4535">passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4536">포트 numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4536">passeport numero</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4537">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4537">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4539">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4539">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4540">7자리 숫자와 1-2개 문자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4540">Seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4541">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4541">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4542">7자리 숫자와 2개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4542">Seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4543">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4544">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4544">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4545">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4545">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4546">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4546">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4547">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4547">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4548">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4548">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4549">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4549">A letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4550">문자 "A" 또는 "H"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4550">The letter "A" or "H" (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4551">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4552">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4552">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4553">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4554">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4555">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4555">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4556">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4556">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4557">Keyword_ireland_pps에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4557">A keyword from Keyword_ireland_pps is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4558">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4558">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4559">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4559">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4560">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4560">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4561">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4561">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4562">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4562">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
<Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
     <Any minMatches="1">
  <Match idRef="Keyword_ireland_pps"/>
  <Match idRef="Func_eu_date"/>
     </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4568">PPS No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4568">PPS No.</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4577">아일랜드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4577">Ireland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4578">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4578">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4579">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4579">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4580">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4580">Seven digits followed by a letter with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4581">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4581">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4582">7 자리 숫자와 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4582">Seven digits followed by a letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4583">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4583">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4584">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4584">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4586">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4586">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4589">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4589">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4590">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4590">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4591">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4591">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4592">이 함수는 해당  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4592">The function  `Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4621">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4621">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4622">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4623">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4623">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4624">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4625">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4625">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4626">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4626">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4627">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4627">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4628">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4628">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4629">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4629">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4630">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4630">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4631">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4631">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4632">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4632">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4633">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4633">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4634">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4634">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4635">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4635">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4636">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4636">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4637">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4637">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4638">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4638">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4639">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4639">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4640">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4640">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4641">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4641">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4642">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4642">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4643">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4643">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4644">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4644">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4645">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4645">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4646">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4647">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4647">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4648">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4649">9자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4649">Nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4650">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4651">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4652">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4653">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4653">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4654">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4654">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4655">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4655">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4656">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4656">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4657">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4657">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4658">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4658">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4659">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4659">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4660">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4660">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4661">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4661">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4662">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4662">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4664">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4664">A combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4665">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4666">10개의 문자 및 숫자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4666">A combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4667">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4667">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4668">문자 "A" 또는 "V"(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4668">The letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4669">7개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4669">Seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4670">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4670">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4671">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4672">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4672">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4673">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4674">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4675">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4675">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4676">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4676">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4677">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4677">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4678">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4678">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4679">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4679">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4680">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4680">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4681">이탈리아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4681">Italy national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4682">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4682">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4684">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4684">A 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4686">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4686">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4687">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4687">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4688">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4688">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4689">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4689">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4690">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4690">One letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4691">Genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4691">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4692">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4692">Four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4693">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4693">One parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4694">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4694">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4695">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4695">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4696">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4696">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4697">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4697">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4698">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4698">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4699">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4699">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4701">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4701">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Italy national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4719">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4736">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4736">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4737">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4737">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4738">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4739">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4739">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4740">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4741">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4741">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4742">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4742">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4743">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4743">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4744">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4745">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4745">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4746">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4747">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4747">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4748">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4748">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4749">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4749">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4750">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4750">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4751">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4751">**Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4752">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4752">italian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4753">repubblica italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4753">repubblica italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4754">passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4754">passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4755">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4755">passaporto italiana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4756">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4756">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4757">italiana passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4757">italiana passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4758">passaporto numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4758">passaporto numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4759">numéro) 포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4759">numéro passeport italien</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4760">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4760">numéro passeport</span></span>

## <a name="italy-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4761">이탈리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4761">Italy tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4762">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4762">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4764">지정 된 패턴의 문자와 숫자 16 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4764">16 letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4766">16 자의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4766">16 letters and digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4767">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4767">Three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4768">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4768">Three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4769">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4769">Two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4770">출생 달에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자는 알파벳 순으로 사용 되지만 A에서 E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자만 사용 되며, 따라서 1 월은 A와 10 월이 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4770">One digit that corresponds to the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4771">남성의와 구별 하기 위해 여성의 경우 짝수에서 출생 일에 40이 추가 되는 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4771">Two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth where 40 is added to the day of birth for females to differentiate from males</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4772">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자-국가 전체 코드를 외국 국가에 사용 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4772">Four digits that correspond to an area code specific to the municipality where the person was born—country-wide codes are used for foreign countries</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4773">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4773">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4774">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4775">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4775">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4776">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4777">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4777">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4778">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4778">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4779">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4779">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4780">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4780">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4781">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4781">The function  `Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
