## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4816">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4816">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4818">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4818">Seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4820">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4820">Bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4821">7 또는 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4821">Seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4822">은행 계좌 지점 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4822">Bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4823">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4823">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4824">공백 또는 대시(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4824">A space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4825">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4825">Three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4826">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4827">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4827">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4828">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4829">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4829">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4830">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4830">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4831">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4831">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4832">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4832">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4833">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4833">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4834">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4834">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4835">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4835">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4836">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4836">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4837">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4837">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4895">Otemachi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4895">Otemachi</span></span>

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4896">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4896">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4897">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4897">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4898">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4898">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4899">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4899">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4900">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4900">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4901">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4901">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4902">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4902">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4903">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4903">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4904">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4904">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4905">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4905">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4906">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4906">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4934">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4934">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4935">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4936">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4936">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4938">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4938">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4939">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4940">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4940">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4941">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4942">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4943">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4943">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4944">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4944">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4945">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4945">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4951">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4951">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4952">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4953">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4953">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4954">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4955">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4955">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4956">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4956">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4957">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4957">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4958">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4958">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4959">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4960">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4960">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4961">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4962">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4962">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4963">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4963">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4964">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4964">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4965">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4965">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4966">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4966">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4967">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4967">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4968">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4968">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4969">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4969">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4970">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4970">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4971">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4971">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4972">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4972">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4973">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4973">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4974">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4974">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4975">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4975">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4976">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4977">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4977">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4978">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4979">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4979">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4980">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4980">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4981">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4981">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4982">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4982">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4983">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4983">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4986">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4986">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4987">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4987">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4988">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4988">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4989">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4989">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4990">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4990">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4991">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4991">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4992">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4992">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-4994">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4994">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4995">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4995">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4996">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4996">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4997">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4997">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-4998">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4998">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-4999">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-4999">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5000">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5000">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5001">하이픈 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5001">A hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5002">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5002">Six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5003">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5003">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5005">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5005">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5008">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5008">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5009">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5009">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5011">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5011">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5012">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5012">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5013">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5013">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5014">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5014">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5015">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5015">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5016">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5016">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5017">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5017">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5018">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5018">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5019">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5019">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5020">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5020">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5021">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5021">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5022">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5023">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5023">Three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5025">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5025">Three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5026">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5026">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5027">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5027">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5028">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5028">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5029">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5029">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5030">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5030">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5031">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5031">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5032">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5032">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5033">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5033">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5034">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5034">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5035">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5035">**Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5036">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5036">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5037">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5037">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5038">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5038">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5039">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5039">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5040">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5040">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5041">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5041">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5049">라트비아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5049">Latvia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5050">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5050">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5051">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5052">지정 된 형식의 11 자리 숫자 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5052">11 digits and a hyphen in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5053">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5054">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5054">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5055">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5055">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5056">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5056">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5057">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5057">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5058">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5058">Four digits, randomly generated</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5059">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5060">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5060">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5061">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5062">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5063">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5063">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5064">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5064">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5065">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5066">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5066">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Latvia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
 <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5129">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5129">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5130">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5130">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5131">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5132">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5132">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5133">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5133">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5134">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5134">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5135">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5135">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5136">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5136">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5137">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5138">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5138">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5139">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5140">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5140">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5141">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5141">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5142">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5142">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5143">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5143">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5144">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5144">**Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5146">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5146">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5147">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5147">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5149">라트비아 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5149">Latvia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5150">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5150">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5151">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5152">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5152">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5153">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5154">지정 된 패턴에서 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5154">11 digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5155">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5155">Six digits that correspond to the date of birth (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5156">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 이며, "0"은 19th 세기에 해당 하 고 "1"은 20th 세기에 해당 하며 21 세기에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5156">One digit that corresponds to the century of birth where "0" corresponds to 19th century, "1" corresponds to 20th century, and "2"corresponds to 21st century</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5157">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5157">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5158">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5159">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5159">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5160">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5161">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5161">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5162">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5162">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5163">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5163">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5164">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5165">이 함수는 해당  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5165">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5228">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5228">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5229">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5229">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5230">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5230">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5231">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5231">Eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5232">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5232">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5233">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5233">Eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5234">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5235">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5235">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5236">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5237">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5237">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5238">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5238">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5239">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5239">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5240">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5240">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5241">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5241">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5242">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5242">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5243">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5243">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5244">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5244">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5245">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5245">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5246">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5246">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5255">리투아니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5255">Lithuania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5256">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5256">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5257">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5257">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5258">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5258">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5259">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5259">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5260">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5260">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5261">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5261">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5262">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5262">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5263">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5263">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5264">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5264">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5265">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5265">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5266">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5266">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5267">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5267">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5268">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5268">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5269">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5269">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5270">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5270">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5271">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5271">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5272">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5272">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Lithuania national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern> 
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5307">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5307">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5308">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5308">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5309">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5310">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5310">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5311">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5312">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5312">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5313">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5313">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5314">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5314">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5315">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5315">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5316">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5316">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5317">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5317">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5318">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5318">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5319">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5319">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5320">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5320">**Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5321">여권 번호 lithunian 여권 번호 passport 암호 없음 o numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5321">passport number lithunian passport number passport no paso numeris</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5322">리투아니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5322">Lithuania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5323">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5323">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5324">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5325">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5325">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5326">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5327">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5327">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5328">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5329">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5329">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5331">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5331">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5332">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5332">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5333">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5334">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5335">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5335">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5336">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5336">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5369">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5369">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5370">중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5370">his sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5371">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5371">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5372">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5372">Six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5373">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5373">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5374">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5374">Six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5375">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5376">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5376">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5377">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5378">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5378">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5379">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5379">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5380">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5380">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5381">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5381">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5382">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5382">**Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5383">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5383">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5384">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5384">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5385">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5385">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5386">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5386">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5387">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5387">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5388">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5388">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5389">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5389">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5390">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5390">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5391">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5391">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5392">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5392">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5393">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5393">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5395">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5395">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5396">룩셈부르크 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5396">Luxemburg national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5397">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5397">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5399">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5399">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5401">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5401">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5402">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5402">One digit that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5403">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5403">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5404">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5404">Three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5405">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5405">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5406">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5407">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5407">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5409">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5410">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5410">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5411">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5411">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5434">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5434">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5435">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5435">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5436">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5436">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5437">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5437">Eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5438">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5439">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5439">Eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5440">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5441">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5441">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5442">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5443">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5443">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5444">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5444">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5445">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5445">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5446">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5446">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5447">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5447">**Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5448">여권 번호 라트비아어 여권 passport 번호 passport passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5448">passport number latvian passport number passport no passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5449">룩셈부르크 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5449">Luxemburg tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5450">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5450">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5451">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5451">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5452">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5452">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5453">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5453">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5454">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5454">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5455">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5455">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5456">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5456">Two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5457">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5457">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5458">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5458">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5459">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5459">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5460">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5460">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5461">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5461">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5462">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5462">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5463">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5463">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5464">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5464">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5504">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5504">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5505">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5506">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5506">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5507">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5508">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5508">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5509">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5509">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5510">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5510">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5511">2개 문자로 이루어진 출생지 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5511">Two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5512">대시(옵션)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5512">A dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5513">임의의 3자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5513">Three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5514">1자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5514">One-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5516">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5516">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5519">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5519">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5520">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5520">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
