- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5544">말레이지아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5544">malaysian identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5545">nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5545">nric</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5546">개인 식별 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5546">personal identification card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5547">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5547">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5548">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5548">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5549">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5550">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5550">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5551">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5552">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5552">Combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5553">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5553">Two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5554">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5554">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5555">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5555">Three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5556">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5556">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5557">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5557">Three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5558">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5558">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5559">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5559">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5560">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5560">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5561">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5561">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5562">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5562">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5563">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5563">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5564">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5564">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5565">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5565">**Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5566">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5566">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5567">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5567">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5568">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5568">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5569">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5569">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5570">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5570">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5571">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5571">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5572">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5572">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5573">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5573">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5574">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5574">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5575">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5575">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5576">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5576">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5577">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5577">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5578">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5578">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5579">몰타 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5579">Malta national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5580">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5580">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5581">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5582">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5582">Seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5583">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5584">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5584">Seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5585">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5585">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5586">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5586">One uppercase letter (case sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5587">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5587">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5588">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5588">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5589">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5589">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5590">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5590">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5591">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5591">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5592">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5592">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5593">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5593">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5594">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5594">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Malta national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5599">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5599">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5600">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5600">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5601">numru ta ' personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5601">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5602">numru ta ' taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5602">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5603">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5603">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5604">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5604">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5605">numru taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5605">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5606">numru tat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5606">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5607">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5607">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5608">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5608">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5609">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5609">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5610">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5610">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5611">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5611">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5612">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5612">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5613">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5613">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5614">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5614">Seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5615">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5615">Pattern</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5616">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5616">Seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5617">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5617">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5618">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5618">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5619">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5619">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5620">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5620">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5621">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5621">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5622">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5622">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5623">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5623">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5624">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5624">**Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5625">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5625">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5626">몰타어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5626">maltese passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5627">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5627">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5628">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5628">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5629">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5629">Malta tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5630">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5630">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5631">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5632">몰타어 nationals의 경우 지정 된 패턴의 7 자리 및 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5632">For Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5633">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5633">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5635">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5635">Maltese nationals: 7 digits and one letter</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5636">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5636">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5637">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5637">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5638">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5638">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: 9 digits</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5639">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5639">Nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5640">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5641">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5641">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5642">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5643">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5643">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5644">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5644">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5645">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5645">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5646">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5646">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5647">이 함수는 해당  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5647">The function  `Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5680">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5680">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5681">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5682">선택적으로 공백을 포함하는 8-9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5682">8-9 digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5683">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5684">8-9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5684">8-9 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5685">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5685">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5686">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5686">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5687">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5687">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5688">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5688">A space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5689">2-3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5689">2-3 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5690">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5690">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5691">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5691">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5692">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5692">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5693">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5693">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5694">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5694">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5695">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5695">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5696">Func_eu_date2 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5696">The function Func_eu_date2 finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5697">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5697">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
<Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Keyword_netherlands_bsn" /> 
       <Match idRef="Func_eu_date2" /> 
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_bsn"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5699">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5699">Keyword_netherlands_bsn</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5700">bsn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5700">bsn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5701">bsn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5701">bsn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5703">시민 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5703">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5704">사용자 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5704">person number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5705">개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5705">personal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5706">개인 숫자 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5706">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5707">사용자 관련 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5707">person-related number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5708">persoonlijk nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5708">persoonlijk nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5709">persoonlijke 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5709">persoonlijke numerieke code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5710">persoonsgebonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5710">persoonsgebonden</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5711">persoonsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5711">persoonsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5712">사회 aal-fiscaal nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5712">sociaal-fiscaal nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5713">사회적-회계 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5713">social-fiscal number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5714">sofi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5714">sofi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5715">sofinummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5715">sofinummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5716">identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5716">uniek identificatienummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5717">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5717">uniek identiteitsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5718">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5718">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5719">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5719">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5720">uniqueidentityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5720">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5721">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5721">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5722">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5722">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5723">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5723">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5724">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5724">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5725">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5725">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5726">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5726">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5727">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5727">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5728">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5728">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5729">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5729">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5730">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5731">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5731">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5732">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5732">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5733">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5733">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5734">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5734">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5735">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5735">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5736">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5736">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5737">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5737">driver license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5750">네덜란드 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5750">Netherlands national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5751">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5751">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5752">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5752">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5753">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5753">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5754">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5754">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5755">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5755">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5756">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5757">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5757">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5758">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5759">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5760">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5760">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5761">From 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5761">A keyword from is found.</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5762">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5762">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5763">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5763">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Netherland national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5787">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5787">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5788">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5788">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5789">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5790">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5790">Nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5791">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5792">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5792">Nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5793">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5794">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5794">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5795">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5796">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5796">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5797">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5797">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5798">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5798">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5799">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5799">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5800">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5800">**Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5801">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5801">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5802">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5802">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5803">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5803">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5804">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5804">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5805">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5805">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5806">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5806">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5807">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5807">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5808">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5808">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5809">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5809">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5810">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5811">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5811">Nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5812">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5813">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5813">Nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5814">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5815">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5815">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5816">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5817">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5818">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5818">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5819">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5819">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5820">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5820">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5821">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5821">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5822">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5826">hulandes impuesto id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5826">hulandes impuesto id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5827">hulandes impuesto 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5827">hulandes impuesto identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5828">identificatienummer belasting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5828">identificatienummer belasting</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5829">identificatienummer van belasting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5829">identificatienummer van belasting</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5859">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5859">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5860">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5860">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5861">3개 문자, 공백 1개(선택 사항) 및 4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5861">Three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5862">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5862">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5863">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5863">Three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5864">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5865">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5865">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5866">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5867">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5868">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5868">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5869">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5869">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5870">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5870">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5871">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5871">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5872">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5872">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5873">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5873">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5874">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5874">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5875">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5875">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5876">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5876">treatment</span></span> 
   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5877">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5877">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5878">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5878">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5879">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5879">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5880">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5880">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5881">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5881">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5882">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5882">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5883">3자리 개인 번호 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5883">Three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5884">2개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5884">Two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5886">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5886">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5889">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5889">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5890">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5890">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5891">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5891">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5892">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5893">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5893">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5894">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5894">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5895">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5895">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5903">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5903">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5904">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5905">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5905">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5906">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5907">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5907">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5908">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5908">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5909">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5909">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5910">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5910">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5911">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5911">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5912">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5912">One digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5913">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5914">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5914">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5915">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5916">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5916">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5917">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5917">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5918">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5918">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5919">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5919">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5920">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5920">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5921">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5921">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5922">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5922">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5923">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5923">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5924">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5924">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5925">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5925">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5926">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5927">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5928">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5928">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5929">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5930">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5930">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5931">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5931">Five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5932">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5932">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5933">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5933">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5934">정방향 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5934">A forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5935">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5935">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5936">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5937">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5937">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5938">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5939">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5939">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5940">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5940">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5941">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5941">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5942">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5942">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5943">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5943">**Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5944">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5944">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5946">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5946">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5947">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5947">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5948">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5948">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5949">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5949">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5950">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5950">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5951">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5951">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5952">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5952">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5953">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5953">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5954">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5954">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5955">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5955">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5956">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5956">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5957">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5957">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5958">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5959">3개의 문자 및 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5959">Three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5961">3개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5961">Three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5962">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5962">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5963">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5963">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5964">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5964">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5965">DLP 정책은 300 Func_polish_national_id 문자에 근접 한 경우에는이 유형의 중요 한 정보를 검색 하는 것으로 75% 확신 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5965">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters: The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5966">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5966">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5967">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5968">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5968">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5969">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5969">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5970">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5970">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5971">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5971">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5972">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5972">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5973">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5973">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5974">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5974">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5975">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5975">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5976">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5976">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5977">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5977">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5978">폴란드 국가 ID(PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5978">Poland National ID (PESEL)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5979">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5979">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5980">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5981">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5981">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5982">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5983">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5983">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5984">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5985">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5985">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5986">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-5987">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5987">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5988">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5988">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5989">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5989">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5990">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5990">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->      
<Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5991">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5991">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-5992">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5992">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5993">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5993">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5994">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5994">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5995">niepowtarzalny u r i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5995">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5996">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5996">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5997">veiligheid.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5997">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5998">veiligheid-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5998">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-5999">u r i identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-5999">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6000">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6000">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6001">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6001">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6002">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6002">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6003">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6003">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6004">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6005">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6005">Two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6007">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6007">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6008">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6009">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6009">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6010">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6011">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6011">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6012">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6012">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6013">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6013">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6014">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6014">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6015">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6015">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6016">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6016">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6017">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6017">Numer paszportu</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6021">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6021">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6022">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6022">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6023">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6023">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6024">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6024">Eleven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6025">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6025">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6026">11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6026">Eleven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6027">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6028">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6028">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6029">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6030">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6030">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6031">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6031">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6032">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6032">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6033">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6033">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6034">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6034">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6064">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6064">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6065">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6065">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6066">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID에 해당 하는 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6066">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6067">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6068">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6068">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6069">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6070">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6070">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6071">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6072">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6073">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6074">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6074">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6075">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6075">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6076">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6076">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6086">identification number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6096">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6096">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6097">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6097">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6098">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6099">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6099">Two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6100">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6101">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6101">Two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6102">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6102">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6103">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6103">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6104">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6104">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6105">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6105">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6106">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6106">One digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6107">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6108">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6109">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6110">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6110">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6111">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6111">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6112">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6112">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
