## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6128">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6128">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6129">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6130">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6131">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6131">One letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6132">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6133">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6133">One letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6134">1개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6134">One letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6135">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6135">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6136">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6136">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6137">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6137">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6138">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6138">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6139">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6139">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6140">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6140">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6141">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6141">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6142">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6142">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6143">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6143">**Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6144">여권 번호 포르투갈어 passport 번호 passport número do passaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6144">passport number portuguese passport number passport no número do passaporte</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6145">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6145">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6146">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6146">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6147">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6148">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6148">Nine digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6149">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6150">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6150">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6151">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6152">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6152">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6153">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6154">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6154">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6155">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6155">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6156">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6156">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6157">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6158">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6158">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6183">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6183">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6184">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6184">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6185">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6185">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6186">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6186">One character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6187">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6187">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6188">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6188">One character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6189">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6189">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6190">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6190">Eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6191">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6192">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6194">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6195">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6195">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6196">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6196">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6197">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6197">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6198">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6198">**Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6201">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6201">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6202">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6202">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6203">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6203">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6204">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6204">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6205">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6205">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6206">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6206">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6207">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6207">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6208">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6208">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6209">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6209">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6210">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6210">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6211">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6211">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6212">루마니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6212">Romania national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6213">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6213">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6215">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6215">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6217">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6217">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6218">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6219">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6219">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6220">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6221">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6222">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6222">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6223">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6223">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6224">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6224">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6225">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6225">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!--Romania national identification number  -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6276">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6276">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6277">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6277">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6279">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6279">Eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6280">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6280">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6281">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6281">Eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6282">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6282">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6283">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6283">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6284">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6284">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6285">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6285">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6286">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6286">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6287">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6287">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6288">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6288">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6289">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6289">**Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6290">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6290">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6291">루마니아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6291">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6292">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6292">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6293">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6293">numărul pașaportului</span></span>

## <a name="romania-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6294">루마니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6294">Romania tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6295">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6295">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6296">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6296">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6297">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6297">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6298">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6298">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6299">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6299">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6300">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6301">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6301">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6302">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6304">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6304">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6305">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6305">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6356">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6356">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6357">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6358">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6358">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6359">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6360">10자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6360">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6361">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6361">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6362">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6362">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6363">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6363">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6364">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6364">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6365">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6365">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6366">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6366">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6367">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6367">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6368">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6369">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6369">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6370">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6370">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6371">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6371">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6372">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6373">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6373">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6374">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6375">9개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6375">Nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6376">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6376">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6377">9개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6377">Nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6378">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T"(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6378">The letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6379">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6379">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6380">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6380">An alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6381">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6381">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6382">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6382">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6383">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6383">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6384">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6385">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6385">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6386">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6386">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6387">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6387">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6388">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6388">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6389">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6389">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6390">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6390">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6391">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6391">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6392">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6392">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6395">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6395">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6396">비용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6396">IC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6400">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6400">身份證</span></span> 

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6401">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6401">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6402">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6402">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6403">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6403">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6404">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6404">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6405">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6405">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6406">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6406">One character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6407">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6407">One letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6408">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6408">Seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6409">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6409">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6410">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6410">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6411">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6411">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6412">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6412">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6413">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6413">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6414">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6414">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6415">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6415">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6416">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6416">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6417">dl # driver license driver 면허 번호 드라이버 라이선스 드라이버 lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6417">dl# driver license driver license number driver licence drivers lic.</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6418">drivers license driver 면허 드라이버의 라이선스 드라이버 라이선스 번호 운전 면허 번호 라이센스 번호 제어 # vodičský preukaz</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6418">drivers license drivers licence driver's license driver's license number driver's licence number driving license number dlno# vodičský preukaz</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6419">슬로바키아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6419">Slovakia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6420">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6420">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6421">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6421">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6422">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6422">Ten digits containing one backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6423">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6423">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6424">백슬래시 하나를 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6424">Ten digits containing one backslash:</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6425">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6425">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6426">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6426">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6427">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6427">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6428">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6428">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6429">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6429">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6430">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6430">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6431">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6431">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6432">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6432">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovakia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6479">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6479">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6480">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6480">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6481">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6482">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6482">One digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6483">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6484">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6484">One digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6485">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6486">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6487">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6488">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6489">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6489">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6490">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6490">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6491">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6491">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6492">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6492">**Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6493">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6493">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6494">슬로바키아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6494">slovakian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6495">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6495">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6496">číslo (u)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6496">číslo pasu</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6497">슬로바키아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6497">Slovakia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6498">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6498">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6499">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6500">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6500">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6501">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6502">10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6502">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6503">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6504">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6504">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6505">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6506">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6507">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6507">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6508">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6508">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6510">Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6510">Keywords_slovakia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6514">číslo občianského preukazu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6514">číslo občianského preukazu</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6516">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6516">id number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6555">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6555">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6556">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6557">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6558">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6558">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6559">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6560">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6560">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6561">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6562">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6563">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6564">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6564">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6565">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6566">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6566">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6568">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6568">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6571">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6571">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6572">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6572">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6578">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6578">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6582">슬로베니아 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6582">Slovenia national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6583">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6583">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6584">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6584">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6585">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6585">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6586">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6586">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6587">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6587">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6588">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6588">Seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6589">출생 면적에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6589">Two digits that correspond to the area of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6590">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6590">Three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6591">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6591">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6592">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6593">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6594">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6595">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6596">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6596">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6597">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6597">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6598">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6598">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6599">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6599">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- Slovenia national identification number -->
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6622">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6622">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6623">고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6623">unique master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6624">고유 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6624">unique registration number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6627">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6627">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6628">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6628">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6629">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6630">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6630">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6631">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6632">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6632">Two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6633">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6633">The letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6634">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6634">One uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6635">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6635">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6637">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6637">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6639">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6640">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6640">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6641">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6641">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6642">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6642">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6643">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6643">**Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6644">여권 번호 슬로베니아어 여권 번호 passport no številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6644">passport number slovenian passport number passport no številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6645">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6645">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6646">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6646">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6647">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6647">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6648">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6648">Eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6649">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6650">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6650">Eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6651">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6651">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6652">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6652">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6653">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6653">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6654">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6654">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6655">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6655">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6656">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6656">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6657">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6657">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6658">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6658">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6682">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6682">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6684">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6684">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6685">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6686">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6686">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6687">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6687">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6688">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6688">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6689">1자리 시민권 표시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6689">A single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6690">숫자 "8" 또는 "9" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6690">The digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6691">체크섬 숫자에 해당하는 1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6691">One digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6692">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6693">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6694">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6695">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6696">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6696">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6697">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6697">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6698">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6699">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6699">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6700">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6700">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6701">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6701">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6702">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6702">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6703">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6703">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6704">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6704">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6705">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6705">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6706">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6706">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6708">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6708">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6709">생년월일에 해당하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6709">Six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6710">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6710">A hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6711">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6711">One digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6712">4자리 출생 지역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6712">Four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6713">앞 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분하기 위해 사용되는 1자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6713">One digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6714">검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6714">A check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6715">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6716">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6716">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6717">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6718">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6718">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6719">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6719">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6720">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6720">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6721">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6721">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6722">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6722">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6723">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6723">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6724">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6724">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6730">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6730">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6732">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6732">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6733">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6733">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6734">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6735">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6735">Eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6736">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6737">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6737">Eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6738">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6738">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6739">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6739">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6740">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6741">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6741">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6742">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6744">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6744">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6745">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6745">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6782">스페인 국립 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6782">Spain national identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6783">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6783">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6784">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6785">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6785">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6787">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6787">Seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6788">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6788">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6789">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6789">One digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6790">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6790">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6791">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6791">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6792">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6792">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6793">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6794">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6794">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6795">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6795">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- Spain national identification number -->
 
<Entity id="419f449f-6d9d-4be1-a154-b531f7a91b41" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
