- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6817">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6817">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6818">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6818">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6819">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6819">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6820">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6820">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6821">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6822">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6822">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6823">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6824">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6824">An eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6825">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6825">Two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6826">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6826">One digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6827">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6827">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6829">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6829">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6832">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6832">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6833">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6833">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6834">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6834">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6835">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6835">**Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6836">여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6836">passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6837">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6837">spain passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6838">passport 책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6838">passport book</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6839">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6839">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6840">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6840">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6841">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6841">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6842">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6842">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6843">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6843">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6844">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6844">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6845">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6845">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6846">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6846">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6847">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6848">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6848">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6850">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6850">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6851">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6851">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6852">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6852">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6853">7-8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6853">7-8 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6854">정방향 슬래시 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6854">A forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6855">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6855">Two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6856">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6857">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6857">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6859">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6860">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6860">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6861">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6861">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6862">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6862">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6863">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6863">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6864">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6864">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6865">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6865">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6866">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6866">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6867">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6867">Seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6868">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6868">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6869">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6869">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6870">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6870">Eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6871">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6871">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6872">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6872">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6873">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6873">One uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6874">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6874">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6875">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6875">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6876">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6876">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6877">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6877">One uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6878">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6878">Seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6879">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6879">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6880">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6880">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6881">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6881">One uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6882">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6882">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6883">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6883">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6884">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6884">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6885">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6885">One uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6886">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6886">Seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6887">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6887">One uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6888">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6888">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6889">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6889">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6890">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6890">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6891">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6891">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6892">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6892">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6893">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6893">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6894">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6894">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6895">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6895">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6896">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6896">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6897">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6897">Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6898">cif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6898">cif</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6899">cifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6899">cifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6900">cifnúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6900">cifnúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6901">número de contribuyente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6901">número de contribuyente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6902">número de identificación 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6902">número de identificación fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6903">número de impuesto corporativo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6903">número de impuesto corporativo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6904">spanishcifid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6904">spanishcifid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6905">spanishcifid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6905">spanishcifid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6906">spanishcifno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6906">spanishcifno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6907">spanishcifno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6907">spanishcifno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6908">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6908">tax file no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6909">세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6909">tax file number</span></span>

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6926">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6926">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6927">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6928">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6928">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6929">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6929">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6930">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6930">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6931">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6931">Any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6932">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6932">The string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6933">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6933">An equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6934">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6934">Any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6935">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6935">Any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6936">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6936">A semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6937">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6937">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6938">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6938">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6939">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6939">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6940">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6940">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6941">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6941">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6942">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6942">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6943">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6943">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6944">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6944">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6945">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6945">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6946">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6946">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6947">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6947">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6948">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6948">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6949">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6949">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6950">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6950">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6951">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6951">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6952">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6952">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6953">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6953">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6954">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6954">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6955">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6955">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6956">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6956">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6957">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6957">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6958">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6958">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6959">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6959">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6960">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6960">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6961">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6961">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6962">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6962">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6963">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6963">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6964">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6964">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6965">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6965">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6966">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6966">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6967">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6967">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6968">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6968">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6969">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6969">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6970">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6970">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6971">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6971">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6972">스웨덴 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6972">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6973">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6973">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6974">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6975">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6975">Ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6976">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6977">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6977">Ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6978">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6978">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6979">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6979">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6980">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6980">Four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6981">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6981">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6982">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6982">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6983">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6983">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6984">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6985">정규식이 해당  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6985">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6986">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6986">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-6987">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6987">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-6988">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver ' s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6988">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6989">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6989">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6990">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6990">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6991">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6991">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6992">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6992">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6993">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6993">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6994">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6994">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6995">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6995">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6996">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6996">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6997">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6997">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6998">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6998">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-6999">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-6999">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7000">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7000">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7001">körkort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7001">körkort</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7002">스웨덴 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7002">Sweden National ID</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7003">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7003">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7004">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7005">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7005">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7006">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7007">10 또는 12자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7007">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7008">2-4자리 숫자(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7008">2-4 digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7009">YYMMDD 날짜 형식의 6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7009">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7010">구분 기호 "-" 또는 "+"(선택 사항) 및</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7010">Delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional), plus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7011">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7011">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7012">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7013">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7013">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7014">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7015">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7015">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7016">Func_swedish_national_identifier 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7016">The function Func_swedish_national_identifier finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7017">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7017">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden National ID -->
<Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7018">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7018">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7019">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7019">No</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7020">스웨덴 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7020">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7021">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7021">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7022">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7022">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7023">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7023">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7024">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7024">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7025">8자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7025">Eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7026">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7026">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7027">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7027">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7028">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7028">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7029">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7029">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7030">Regex_sweden_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7030">The regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7031">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7031">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7032">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7032">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7033">Keyword_sweden_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7033">A keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7064">스웨덴 주민 등록 번호 또는 이와 동등한 정보</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7064">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7065">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7065">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7066">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7066">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7067">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7067">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7068">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7068">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7069">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7069">12 digits:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7070">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 8 자리 숫자 (YYYYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7070">Eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7071">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7071">Three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7072">일련 번호의 마지막 숫자는 남성에 홀수를 할당 하는 성별과 암의 짝수를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7072">The last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7073">최대 1990의 일련 번호를 사용 하 여 전화를 corresponded 하는 국가 (1947 이전 1947에는 immigrants 앞에 탄생 한 경우)에는 세금 기록에 따라 해당 번호에 대 한 특수 코드 (일반적으로 9 자리 숫자)가 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7073">Up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7074">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7074">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7075">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7076">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7077">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7078">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7079">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7079">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7080">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7080">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7081">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7081">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7082">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7082">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7083">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7083">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7084">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7084">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7085">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7085">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7086">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7086">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7087">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7087">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7088">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7088">identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7089">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7089">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7090">개인 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7090">personal identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7091">personnummer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7091">personnummer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7092">personligt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7092">personligt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7093">unikt id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7093">unikt id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7094">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7094">personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7095">identifikationsnumret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7095">identifikationsnumret</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7096">personnummer #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7096">personnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7097">identifikationsnumret #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7097">identifikationsnumret#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7098">스웨덴 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7098">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7099">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7099">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7100">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7100">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7101">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 숫자와 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7101">Ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7102">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7102">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7103">10 자리 숫자와 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7103">Ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7104">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7104">Six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7105">더하기 기호, 빼기 기호 또는 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7105">A plus sign, minus sign, or backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7106">다음은 식별 번호를 고유 하 게 만드는 3 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7106">Three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7107">1990 이전에 실행 된 번호의 경우 일곱째 및 여덟 번째 숫자는 출생 또는 외부에서 태어난 사람의 국가를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7107">For numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7108">아홉 번째 위치의 숫자는 성별에 대 한 홀수 또는 암도를 나타냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7108">The digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7109">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7109">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7110">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7110">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7111">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7111">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7112">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7112">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7113">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7113">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7114">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7114">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7115">From 키워드를  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7115">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7116">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7116">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7117">이 함수는 해당  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7117">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7143">SWIFT 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7143">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7144">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7145">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7145">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7146">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7147">4개의 문자, 5-31개 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7147">Four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7148">4문자 은행 코드(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7148">Four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7149">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7149">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7150">4-28개 문자 또는 숫자[BBAN(기본 은행 계좌 번호)]</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7150">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7151">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7151">An optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7152">1-3개 문자 또는 숫자(BBAN의 나머지)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7152">1-3 letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7153">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7154">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7155">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7156">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7157">Regex_swift 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7157">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7158">Keyword_swift의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7158">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7192">대만식 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7192">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7193">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7193">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7194">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7194">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7195">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7195">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7196">1개의 문자, 9자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7196">One letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7197">1개 문자(영문, 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7197">One letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7198">숫자 "1" 또는 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7198">The digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7199">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7199">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7200">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7201">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7201">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7202">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7203">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7204">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7204">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7205">Keyword_taiwanese_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7205">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7206">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7207">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7207">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7208">Func_taiwanese_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7208">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7209">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7209">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7226">대만 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7226">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7227">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7227">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7228">생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7228">Biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7229">비-생체 인식 여권 번호: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7229">Non-biometric passport number: Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7230">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7230">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7231">생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7231">Biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7232">숫자 "3" </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7232">The digit "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7233">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7233">Eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7234">비-생체 인식 여권 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7234">Non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7235">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7235">Nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7236">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7237">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7237">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7238">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7239">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7240">정규식 Regex_taiwan_passport 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7240">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7241">Keyword_taiwan_passport에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7241">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7252">대만 상주 인증서 (ARC/TARC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7252">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7253">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7253">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7254">10개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7254">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7255">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7255">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7256">10개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7256">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7257">2문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7257">Two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7258">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7258">Eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7259">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7260">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7260">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7262">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7263">정규식 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7263">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7264">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7264">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7265">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7265">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7266">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7266">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7272">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7272">ARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7274">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7274">TARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7277">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7277">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7278">태국어 인구 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7278">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7279">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7280">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7280">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7282">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7282">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7283">첫 번째 숫자가 0 또는 9가 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7283">First digit is not 0 or 9</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7284">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7284">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7285">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7287">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7289">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7289">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7290">Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7290">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7291">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7291">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7292">Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7292">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7293">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7293">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7295">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7295">ID Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7297">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7297">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7298">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7298">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7299">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7299">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7300">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7300">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7301">터키어 국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7301">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7302">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7303">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7303">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7304">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7305">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7305">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7306">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7306">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7307">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7307">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7308">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7308">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7309">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7309">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7310">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7310">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7311">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7311">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7312">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7312">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7313">Func_Turkish_National_Id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7313">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7314">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7314">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7315">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7315">Keyword_Turkish_National_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7316">TC Kimlik 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7316">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7317">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7317">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7318">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7318">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7319">Vatandaşlık 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7319">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7320">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7320">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7321">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7321">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7322">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7322">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7323">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7324">지정된 형식의 18개 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7324">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7325">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7325">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7326">18개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7326">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7327">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7327">Five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7328">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7328">One digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7329">날짜 형식의 5 자리 숫자 MMDDY 생년월일 (드라이버가 암 인 경우 50이 고 62 51은 01부터 12까지)로 증가 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7329">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7330">2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 문자 대신 숫자 "9" 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7330">Two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7331">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7331">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7332">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7333">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7333">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7334">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7335">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7336">Func_uk_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7336">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7337">Keyword_uk_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7337">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7338">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7338">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7348">motorcycles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7348">motorcycles</span></span>
