## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7356">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7356">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7357">electoral 롤 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7357">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7358">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7359">2개의 문자, 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7359">Two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7360">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7361">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 1-4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7361">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7363">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7363">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7366">Regex_uk_electoral 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7366">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7367">Keyword_uk_electoral의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7367">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7368">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7368">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7369">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7369">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7370">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7370">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7371">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7371">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7372">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7372">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7373">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7373">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7374">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7374">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7375">국가 의료 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7375">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7376">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7377">공백으로 구분된 10-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7377">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7378">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7379">10-17자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7379">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7380">3 또는 10자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7380">Either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7381">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7381">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7382">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7382">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7383">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7383">A space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7384">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7384">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7385">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7386">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7386">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7387">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7388">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7388">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7389">Func_uk_nhs_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7389">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7390">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7390">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7391">Keyword_uk_nhs_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7391">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7392">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7392">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7393">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7393">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7394">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7394">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7395">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7395">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7412">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7412">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7413">국가 보험 번호 (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7413">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7414">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 Identificaiton 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7414">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7415">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7415">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7416">공백 또는 대시로 구분 된 7 자 또는 9 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7416">7 characters or 9 characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7417">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7417">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7418">다음과 같은 두 가지 패턴을 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7418">Two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7419">두 문자 (유효한 NINOs이 접두사의 특정 문자만 사용 하며이 패턴의 유효성 검사는 대/소문자를 구분 하지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7419">Two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7420">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7420">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7421">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' (접두사와 마찬가지로 접미사에서는 특정 문자만 허용 되며 대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7421">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7422">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7422">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7423">2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7423">Two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7424">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7424">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7425">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7425">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7426">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7426">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7427">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7427">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7428">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7428">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7429">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7429">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7430">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7430">A space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7431">' A ', ' B ', ' C ' 또는 ' d ' 중 하나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7431">Either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7432">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7433">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7433">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7434">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7435">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7436">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7436">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7437">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7437">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7438">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7438">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7439">Func_uk_nino 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7439">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7440">Keyword_uk_nino의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7440">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7462">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7462">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7463">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7463">tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7464">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 세금 식별 번호로 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7464">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Tax Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7465">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7466">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 공백 및 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7466">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7467">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7468">UTR (Unique Taxpayer Reference): 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7468">Unique Taxpayer Reference (UTR): 10 digits</span></span>

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7469">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7469">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7470">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7470">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7471">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7471">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7472">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7472">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7473">이 함수는 해당  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7473">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7474">From 키워드를  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7474">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```
 <!-- EU Tax File Number -->
<Entity id="e09c07d3-66e5-4783-989d-49ac62748f5f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7494">미국 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7494">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7495">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7496">8-17자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7496">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7497">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7497">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7498">8-17자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7498">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7499">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7499">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7500">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7500">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7501">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7501">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7502">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7502">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7503">Regex_usa_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7503">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7504">Keyword_usa_Bank_Account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7504">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7534">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7534">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7535">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7536">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7536">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7537">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7537">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7538">주마다 다릅니다(예: 뉴욕).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7538">Depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7539">Ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7539">Nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7540">Ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7540">Nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7541">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7542">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7542">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7543">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7545">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7545">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7546">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7546">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7547">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7547">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7548">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7548">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7549">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7549">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7550">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7550">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7551">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7551">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7552">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7552">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7650">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7650">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7651">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7652">"9"로 시작되고, "7" 또는 "8"을 4번째 숫자로 포함하고, 경우에 따라 공백이나 대시로 서식이 지정된 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7652">Nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7653">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7654">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7654">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7655">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7655">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7656">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7656">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7657">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7657">A space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7658">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7658">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7659">1자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7659">A digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7660">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7660">A space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7661">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7661">Four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7662">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7662">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7663">"9"자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7663">The digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7664">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7664">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7665">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7665">A "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7666">5자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7666">Five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7668">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7668">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7671">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7671">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7672">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7672">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7673">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7673">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7674">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7674">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7675">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7675">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7676">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7676">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7677">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7677">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7678">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7678">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7679">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7679">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7680">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7680">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7681">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7681">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7682">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7682">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7703">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7703">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7704">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7705">서식 있는 패턴 또는 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시될 수 있는 9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7705">9 digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7706">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7706">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7707">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7707">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7708">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7708">Four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7709">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7709">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7710">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7710">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7711">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7711">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7712">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7712">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7713">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7714">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7714">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7715">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7716">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7716">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7717">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7717">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7718">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7718">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7720">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7720">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7721">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7721">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7722">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7722">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7723">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7723">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7724">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7724">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7725">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7725">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7726">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7726">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7727">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7727">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7742">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7742">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7743">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7743">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7744">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7744">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7745">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7745">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7746">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7746">Format</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="65e49-7752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="65e49-7753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7753">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7754">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7754">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="65e49-7755">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="65e49-7755">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
